The Reading Spiral

We choose the books.
The tides choose
the mood.

Every second Thursday at whatever floor we're on. Meetings begin when the compressor cycles off. Bring exact change and an open heart. The building has been on the third floor for two weeks now, so use the east stairwell — the west one leads to February.

Emotional Transparency Report

We believe you deserve to know how your vending machine is feeling.

In accordance with Municipal Code 14.7(b), all sentient dispensary units are required to disclose their current emotional state. We go further. We publish ours in real time. We think it matters. We think you matter.
